alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:22PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, northwestern Broadwater, northwestern Meagher counties through 600 PM MDT... At 521 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of East Helena to 17 miles west of White Sulphur Springs. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... York, Fort Logan On The Smith River and Black Sandy State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central, southwestern and west central Montana.
